{"id":1026312260,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1692500957,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1026312260/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximize the Profit as the Salesman","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int mxm=0;\n    void fxn(vector<vector<int>>& a,int x,int y, int ind,int sum){\n        if(ind==a.size())return ;\n        if(a[ind][0]>y){\n              fxn(a,x,y,ind+1,sum);\n            sum+=a[ind][2];\n            x=a[ind][0];\n                y=a[ind][1];\n            mxm=max(sum,mxm);\n            fxn(a,x,y,ind+1,sum);\n            \n        }else\n            fxn(a,x,y,ind+1,sum);\n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    int maximizeTheProfit(int n, vector<vector<int>>& offers) {\n        fxn(offers,-1,-1,0,0);\n        return mxm;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximize-the-profit-as-the-salesman","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
